name: Crunch berry custard
description:
A Simple classic Crunch Berry Custard enjoy!!
http://www.diymixerscrew.com

Check us out on facebook.. New mixers always welcome!! https://www.facebook.com/groups/456512471380574
Check The video of this mix on youtube.. Recipe here mixed Live ----->https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8sgnoPL2C8&fbclid=IwAR2vpddvRUaH05wgM0VZrnDbE7ZmBHbLUoJHZU8Rj5zvh4SMCLsTsbVuWvI
author: shakenvape007

reviews.text: This may be the best one of all.  **I don't have FE LEMON and didn't sub**  The smell coming from the bottle was too good and I got into this before the 5 day mark.   Oh yeah I used Flavor West Crunch Berry too.  Regardless this one is a banger.   A nice cereal custard that's going on the top shelf.
I wanted a custard. Got one. I wanted some crunch berry cereal. Got that, too! This is a really fun mix! THANKS!
